title: I miss thinking hard
author: jernestomg
aiHeadline: I miss thinking hard: 'Cause apparently, the struggle is over, and now I just get to enjoy the mental relaxation of not having to overthink everything. Progress, right?

title: Voxtral Transcribe 2
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Voxtral Transcribe 2: 'Now you can have your AI-powered transcription done with such precision, you'll wonder if you even need a human editor anymore. Spoiler: You don't.'

title: FBI couldn't get into WaPo reporter's iPhone because Lockdown Mode enabled
author: robin_reala
aiHeadline: FBI couldn't get into WaPo reporter's iPhone: 'Because Lockdown Mode was enabled, proving once again that sometimes, the best defense is just... locking things down. Genius.'

title: Claude is a space to think
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Claude is a space to think: 'Finally, a place where you can go to think without being interrupted by the constant stream of distractions. It's like a digital zen garden, but for your brain.'

title: Show HN: Ghidra MCP Server – 110 tools for AI-assisted reverse engineering
author: xerzes
aiHeadline: Show HN: Ghidra MCP Server – 110 tools for AI-assisted reverse engineering: 'Because who doesn't want to reverse engineer their way through life with the help of some fancy AI tools? Now you can, and it's never been easier.'
